resources.string: Welcome to the educational module that is designed to give a run down on college mathematics. Mathematics is a facinating and wonderful mode of study, you can do anything with math. From being able to analyze patterns, identify trends, and even predict outcomes.
This is the image for college math
Orignally founded by Sir Issac Newton, this is the study of rates of change. Applicable among being able to determine motion kinematics/dynamics.

Leibniz found another way to anaylize rates of change, but did the opposite to Newton. This is primarily the study of finding areas of curves/complex trajectories. Good in being able to measure complex dimensions.
Grassman founded this mode of study, it analyzes linear maps. Mainly utilized to determine outcomes of probabalistic sets. Utilized heavily in computer science and quantum mechanics.
Study of differentiation and integration in 3 dimensional euclidean space. Think of it as calculus with a twist!
An expansion of the calculus concepts applied to higher order functional sets. Primarly used in modes of study involving molecular dynamics or having to model physical quantites more accurately.
